attributes.title: This app is TERRIBLE AND UGLY 🧚🏼‍♀️🌈😍✨💕
attributes.review: First off this app always crashes and takes way too much storage this Orange has so much money yet he can’t even make a decent app. But another thing is that I didn’t know a app can bring toxicity in my life . A few days after I downloaded this app my phone started glitching and eventually shut off . So i couldn’t use my phone for about 2 days. Finally my phone turned back on and the first thing I saw when I unlocked it is a picture of an orange rat looking man and on the picture it said “trump 2020” . I was extremely terrified. So I went to my camera roll to find the picture that I had before on my wallpaper and I could not believe my eyes when I saw a bunch of pictures of oranges which also had a Cheeto puff look to it and out of nowhere I started cry and it felt like my eyes had just gotten shampoo and pepper in it and later my eyes started bleeding. My parents weren’t home it was only me and my grandma. so my poor 200 year old grandmother who is barely able to move her fingers had to get a Uber and rush to the ER . The doctors had diagnosed me with chronic Cheeto puff illness which is clearly un normal and told me if I start seeing army of orange rats with a huge Cheeto puff leading it that I must come back . I then went back home and right when I opened my door that’s exactly what I saw . The terrifying army started throwing oranges at me and I had no choice but to feed my grandma to the army (rip granny💔) . What happened next was just the icing on the cake 😌, the army ate my grandma really quick and started chasing me to the ER . Thankfully the doctors saved me and later they had to do surgery in my eyes and brain for some random reason . It turns out my brain was orange and they had to replace it with a normal brain (I would like to thank the kind woman named Stancey who gave her brain to me that was very much appreciated) . On my way back home I still heard the rats in my head chanting “vote for trump” . I still sometimes see orange little rats come out of my wall and I have even woken up next to one . I am obviously not fully recovered from this traumatic experience and I have hired a great psychologist which at first looked like mr. Cheeto orange Donald himself and it was really scary but the look starts wearing off on her as I get better. Over all I definitely do not recommend this app due to my crazy experience and everyone else’s experiences that I have seen . Don’t let the orange infect your life please I’m warning you🧚🏼‍♀️😙✨🌈😌🖐💕❣️💓🍊
This app took to long to download and what’s the point?

attributes.title: Here to support Hispanics .✊🏼🇲🇽
attributes.review: First things first the app is horrible. I honestly just downloaded so I can right the review. Why is trump so races? What the Hispanic community ever do to him? You know Hispanics have  one of the most beautiful cultures out there. How are we rapist? Yeah their might be some but not all. Mexicans come to the United States to have a better life because you don’t know what it’s like to Not have food on your table. You don’t know what they go through having to work in the hot sun and not being able to spend time with they family. Hispanics come to give they kids a better life then they had. They come to give their children’s a education and a better life do they don’t go through the same thing they parents went through. Hispanics ain’t no alienes!!! They humans with brown skin. They just like every other person in the world. God made all of us. We were meant to be different who in the world would want to look the same?  You know crossing the border is very hard and Mexicans know that and they do it to change. Why trump why you do mean ? What do you not understand? Most white people shoot up schools and you don’t say nothing. Most white people are out in the streets homeless but not Mexicans you know why cuz they work hard 8-15 hours just to bring money for their family just to eat just to live and you do so many cruel things. Why you taking children away from them? Their family’s how would you feel to be seperated from yours ? Oh wait you wouldn’t know cause you don’t care . You don’t have a soul you don’t have the heart. Your dead inside. and it’s funny cuz white people like Mexican food and if it wasn’t for Mexicans you wouldn’t have veggies nun of y’all racist people would. You treat them so unfair! STOP IT !!!! Change be the bigger person I’m here because HISPANICÉ LIVES MATTER!!! I’m here because I want JUSTICE  for Vanessa Guillén. JUSTICE FOR ANDRES GUARDADO !!!!! JUSTICE for ALL my hard working Hispanics that haven’t done nothing wrong stop treating them like animals we’re humans to you like every other person on this earth. Stop racism NOW!!! Why can’t we all live in peace and get along??? It’s sad how you treat Mexicans when they’ve done nothing wrong but to get up at five in the morning to go work. You disgust me trump . But just know that we have God with us and you will pay back for everything you have done for treating Mexicans wrong!! We all have our rights and we should be able to enter the United States and you know what Mexican should you put a border so you “ citizens” don’t go to Mexico and are allowed to enter so that you know how I feels so there are you racist people learn. One day you will need from us Mexicans and best believe we will turn our backs on you.#FREE KIDS #PROUD TO BE MEXICAN 🇲🇽🇲🇽🇲🇽🇲🇽🇲🇽🇲🇽🇲🇽VIVA MEXICO CABRONES ✊🏼🇲🇽🤩🏆
